subject: Attn: scam victims,
body:
Attn: scam victims,
We are pleased to bring to your notice that your name is among 15 scam victims listed for compensation by WORLD BANK/IMF and in conjunction with ECOWAS MONETARY AGENCY.
ECOWAS MONETARY AGENCY has been given the responsibility to super head the payment of your compensation payment of (US$1.5 Million ) through Automated Teller Machines payment system (ATM CARD).
You are advised to contact Mr. Paul Smith, your payment officer through his direct E-mail ( 
worldbanbj04@outlook.com
 ) for fodder directive on your compensatory payment. Be kind enough to reconfirm your details as follows.
Your Full Name, Address, Telephone Number. Your Age ,Your Occupation
 
Yours Sincerely
Mr. Victor Kenneth
Ecowas Monetary Agency
House, room 974 Ecowas Plaza
Central business district of Cotonou
Republic of Benin.

subject: Re:   Attn: scam victims,
body:
Hello Mr. Victor Kenneth,

Thank you for your message. It's quite surprising to hear that my name is on a list by the WORLD BANK IMF and ECOWAS MONETARY AGENCY. I must admit, I'm not entirely sure what this means.

Could you please explain more about this Automated Teller Machines payment system ATM CARD? How does it work exactly?

Also, you mentioned a Mr. Paul Smith as my payment officer. Could you tell me more about him? What will be his role in this process?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Michelle
